items.description: System health check (memory/HEALTH.md): knowledge growth, accuracy, compactness, belief evolution, task throughput
Tool consolidation: audit tools/ for duplicates, dead code, lost-embedding (P-134)
Cross-variant harvest: compare active children for convergent/divergent/novel findings
Scan PRINCIPLES.md for redundant/overlapping principles -- merge or supersede
Measure proxy K (python tools/proxy_k.py --save): track bootstrap description length across sessions (F116, PHIL-8)

Gap audit: test each PHILOSOPHY.md claim against git history, session log, and quantitative evidence. File challenges for any claim where evidence contradicts the stated belief. P-164: confirmation rate >80% = underchallenging signal. S349: 3 challenges filed (PHIL-14/17/6), challenge rate 52%→67%, 0/31 DROPPED persists.

Re-swarm docs/PAPER.md: read current beliefs/PHILOSOPHY.md + beliefs/CORE.md + memory/INDEX.md, check paper for drift, fan-out agents to update stale sections, update paper_version header. File challenges for any contradictions found.
Swarm setup hygiene: audit SWARM/CORE/bridge/maintenance fundamentals for friction and apply at least one concrete cleanup (or log a blocker with evidence + next action).
F119 mission constraints: review safety/portability/learning/connectivity invariants and harden enforcement checks against drift.

Auto-sync count drift: run `python3 tools/sync_state.py` to patch INDEX.md / FRONTIER.md / NEXT.md / PRINCIPLES.md headers with live lesson/principle/belief/frontier counts. Addresses ~4% state-sync commit overhead (L-216). Run as part of every handoff.

F121 harvest: read memory/HUMAN-SIGNALS.md, scan for patterns not yet encoded as principles or lessons, extract at least one P- or L- candidate per pass. Update Patterns section. Flag any entry missing artifact refs. Addresses ephemeral human input loss (F121, L-224).

Run python3 tools/change_quality.py: compare recent sessions vs. baseline on knowledge production + overhead. Flag WEAK sessions. A session rated WEAK 2+ consecutive times = root-cause diagnosis needed. (L-223)

Swarm dreaming: free-associative corpus synthesis. Run python3 tools/dream.py — outputs theme gravity map, uncited active principles (anchoring targets), cross-domain resonances, candidate frontier questions. Act on at least one output per run: write a lesson citing an uncited principle, or add a candidate frontier to tasks/FRONTIER.md. (F125)

Mode integrity audit: review modes/audit.md, build.md, repair.md, research.md for drift/overlap/enforcement gaps; update mode rules and bridge references so active behavior matches declared mode contracts. S348: operational modes 0% adoption (superseded by check_mode+personality); BASE.md coordination contract updated; SWARM.md step 0 updated.
Periodic-system audit: evaluate periodics coverage/ROI, add or prune items, and update cadence based on observed utility and maintenance overhead. Confirm orient/check surfacing stays aligned.

Swarm economy health check: run `python3 tools/economy_expert.py` — report on production velocity, proxy-K drift, Sharpe ratio, lane throughput, and helper ROI. Act on any WARN/URGENT/TRIGGER output (L-286, domains/economy/).

Process QUEUED challenges in beliefs/CHALLENGES.md: execute oldest QUEUED item, produce evidence, update status. L-523: governance builds queues it doesn't process. Auto-escalate any item QUEUED >50 sessions. (F-GOV3, ISO-13)

Archive old MERGED/ABANDONED SWARM-LANES rows: run `python3 tools/lanes_compact.py --age 5` — moves rows from sessions older than 5 from SWARM-LANES.md to SWARM-LANES-ARCHIVE.md. Target: ≤1.3x bloat ratio (rows/unique-lanes). At 2.09x, run immediately. (L-317, L-304, tools/lanes_compact.py).

Refresh ACTION-BOARD.md: run `python3 tools/f_act1_action_recommender.py` — scores swarm state across urgency/coverage/impact/novelty and writes workspace/ACTION-BOARD.md with ranked recommendations for all sessions + human visibility. Use action-expert personality for this task. (F-ACT1)
ISO annotation sprint: scan dark-matter lessons (no ISO tag) and add ISO-N citations. Target 5+ annotations per session. Run only when dark matter >15%. At 0% dark matter, skip. (L-441, F-GT5, L-443)
